channel.title: [562] melee attack from distance rush Help![562]
channel.description: Guys how do i add so people can rush like with dclaws like everyone doing on their d claws pk movie and such, like they attack and hit before they reach the player, now on my server u have to double click and stand next to that player before u can attack.how do i fix this ? it's a jagex scape based source. il rep and advertise u if u want to, Kind regards. Thanks!
